entry.title: New BIP32 structure
entry.summary: In an email conversation, Pavol Rusnak discussed the importance of setting a gap limit for a merchant's server that is handling out hundreds of addresses. The purpose of this system is compatibility over a large number of systems. Rusnak argued that setting the gap limit to high is just a small extra cost, but another participant in the conversation countered that having 100 accounts on 10 different devices would make this cost significant.
